text.name: system_description
text.text: The arduboy is an 8-bit portable game console based on the open source2 Arduino platform. It was initially a Kickstarter3 project by Kevin Bates that came to life in early 2015 and has secured over $400,000 with over 7,000 contributors. It embeds a 1.3-inch monochrome OLED display with a resolution of 128 x 64.
